poem:
A Measure of Power  

The numbers whisper, a fraction's tale,  
Dividing the nation's ancient grail.  
In corridors of weighty ghosts,  
New leaders stack their nightly boasts.  
The dance of power, a delicate art,  
Unspools its thread, its fragile heart.  
Yet only time will carve the face  
Of truth in shadows' measured grace.
